ogTitle: a new era for america & mexico?
ogDescription: one week after the u.s. gov't temporarily closed the busiest u.s.-mexico border crossing, mexico ushers in a new leader who's already making changes.

card_10.cardText:
Pres. Trump has said he is willing to extend his previous deadline for a $5B border wall deal in the wake of President George H.W. Bush's passing. Previously, he threatened a gov't shutdown on December 7th if Congress did not agree to his terms.
